label: Marking
comment: An inscription, stamp or label on packaging, such as to indicate date, ownership, quality, manufacture or origin.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an automatic data capture method type for this packaging marking.
A content, expressed as text, of this note.
A code specifying the content of this note.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the content of this packaging marking.
A code specifying a type of barcode for this packaging marking.
A code specifying a type of packaging marking.

objectProperties.comment: Content, expressed as a monetary amount, for this packaging marking.

referencedBy.comment: A marking specified for this logistics packaging.
A marking specified for this logistics packaging.
